description:
The KMIII static line is designed to meet the scrupulous requirements associated with search and rescue, rigging, and rappelling operations. It has a balanced construction that uses a continuous filament polyester cover braided over a uni-directional nylon core.

  • Survived falls during static line testing: 5
  • Static strength (without terminations) is 36.7kN
  • Shrinkage is 0.5%
  • Core percentage is 52%. Sheath percentage is 48%
  • Meets static cord certification for CE and NFPA
  • Sold by the metre
name: Teufelberger 10.5mm KMIII Nylon Static Rope
